Definition.WordDefinition: Alabama n 1: a state in the southeastern United States on the Gulf of Mexico; one of the Confederate states during the American Civil War [syn: {Heart of Dixie}, {Camellia State}, {AL}] 2: a member of the Muskhogean people formerly living in Alabama; a member of the Creek Confederacy 3: a river in Alabama formed by the confluence of the Coosa and Tallapoosa Rivers near Montgomery; flows southwestward to become a tributary of the Mobile River [syn: {Alabama River}] 4: the Muskhogean language of the Alabama people
